description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Launch an instance
2. Rebuild instance
3. While in rebuilding state, terminate the instance
title: vmware: (corner case) Terminating instance while in rebuilding state leaves orphaned vmdk in vcenter

comments.content:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Launch an instance
2. Rebuild instance
3. While in rebuilding state, terminate the instance
